title: Get-Paid.com
author: Get-Paid.com
content: BSpin.io is offering free crypto = 30 Satoshis every 20 minutes.Are there any other similar sites offering something like that?We know BetFury is offering some free boxes, but other than these 2 sites, are there any other sites offering something similar?

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on April 03, 2023, 04:07:06 PMbut other than these 2 sites, are there any other sites offering something similar?I would also like to add that Freebitco.in is another site that offers free satoshi every hour along with various other ways to earn Bitcoin. This site has been around for a while and has a good reputation in the community. It's a popular faucet site and a gambling site as well. Have you tried Freebitco.in?

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: i think these are called micro earning sites.and there is a section on the forum for it.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=212.0but honestly, they are just a waste of time and effort.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: From my experience, the site with the best faucet is wintomato.com because you can claim it for each coin they have, and they use like 10 coins, so, is nice. But the problem is that if you only play with faucet money they will block your account and tag you as faucet abuser, and they even have some rains in the chat but for that you need to be lvl 2. But again, if you only play with the rains they will block your account for abuse. So, is a double-edged sword.If you want to use a faucet that you can get prizes each hour I would recommend: https://freebitcoins.com/faucet/That one let us claim multiple coins too.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Get-Paid.com on April 03, 2023, 04:07:06 PMBSpin.io is offering free crypto = 30 Satoshis every 20 minutes.Are there any other similar sites offering something like that?We know BetFury is offering some free boxes, but other than these 2 sites, are there any other sites offering something similar? I would like to give you an update about Bertfury's free boxes they used to offer free Crypto or satoshis to rank 1 gambler but after a few months they reserve it for rank 2 or higher, rank 1 gambler can only get Funfury a token so you can participate in their tournament Freebitco.in is also good but they offer per hour and the rewards are way too low that what BSpin.io is giving.Quote from: IIrik11 on April 03, 2023, 04:42:11 PMi think these are called micro earning sites.and there is a section on the forum for it.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=212.0but honestly, they are just a waste of time and effort.OP is asking casinos that offer free satoshis that you can use to play not those coming from faucets

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Seem the usual way of promoting a casino. BSpin will have to continue this 30 sats every 20 mins until they get more users as well. Betfury stopping the boxes and making them available for rank 2 users can decrease users' activity. That experiment will likely backfire.Now that this is announced here, its a signal to visit BSpin.io    So what is the catch with this casino?

comments.author: babygun
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on April 03, 2023, 09:31:55 PMSeem the usual way of promoting a casino. BSpin will have to continue this 30 sats every 20 mins until they get more users as well. Betfury stopping the boxes and making them available for rank 2 users can decrease users' activity. That experiment will likely backfire.Now that this is announced here, its a signal to visit BSpin.io    So what is the catch with this casino?Probably bspin will later on add extra requirements as there will be abuse. I am also interested if any other casinos have a faucet/free boxes. Some have a wheel where you can win crypto (i.e. bc game) but that’s not really the same.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: What’s the requirements to qualify for that every 20 minutes reward? It seems a good promotions where you can have profit by just having an account with that site. I think freebitcoin also have a good promotional campaign, same thing with Roobet though its quiet different but their offers are also good. Will try to visit BSpin to know more about this promotions.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on April 03, 2023, 05:01:51 PMIf you want to use a faucet that you can get prizes each hour I would recommend: https://freebitcoins.com/faucet/That one let us claim multiple coins too.This is the first website that I've thought of if it's about having a faucet to claim every hour. Quote from: bittraffic on April 03, 2023, 09:31:55 PMSeem the usual way of promoting a casino. BSpin will have to continue this 30 sats every 20 mins until they get more users as well. Betfury stopping the boxes and making them available for rank 2 users can decrease users' activity. That experiment will likely backfire.Yes, that's part of their promo to garner more users on them. And from the time that they've taken the number that they've projected after having this promo, they might just stop the service. But if it's one of the reasons to make them have more traffic and make their users stay, they don't have to remove the feature just like what freebitco.in has done over all of these years. Aside from faucets, OP can just join those promotional threads on the Games and rounds(https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=71.0) and join the raffles and contests there.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP is there any restrictions as regards the registration on this site which you have mentioned here because I tried giving it a shot but not accessible from my end. Come to talk of it, this is an old  casino looking for participants and popularity. If I may ask, were you paid to shill on their behalf?  As I checked they have been here for long and I see no reason to be shilling about their casino. If they feel they are becoming unpopular and irrelevant here the option is for them to try do a promotional campaign and advertise their casino so that their presence would be noted here instead of shilling them.I mean no offense just an honest opinion to move forward.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: You'll find more similar casinos by checking Pmalek's thread (List Of Crypto Casinos with the Best Faucets).Quote from: CryptSafe on April 03, 2023, 10:37:54 PMOP is there any restrictions as regards the registration on this site which you have mentioned here because I tried giving it a shot but not accessible from my end. Come to talk of it, this is an old  casino looking for participants and popularity. If I may ask, were you paid to shill on their behalf?  As I checked they have been here for long and I see no reason to be shilling about their casino. If they feel they are becoming unpopular and irrelevant here the option is for them to try do a promotional campaign and advertise their casino so that their presence would be noted here instead of shilling them.I mean no offense just an honest opinion to move forward.Most likely they have geo restrictions and it's normal for some casinos to have restrictions as they might get in trouble if they allow players in every country. I honestly think OP just wants to know more casinos that still offer free balance or faucets because you don't see most casinos give any reward for free unless you gamble regularly. It used to be one of the common rewards you'll see in crypto casinos but eventually, they became ineffective.

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 03, 2023, 09:21:08 PMQuote from: IIrik11 on April 03, 2023, 04:42:11 PMi think these are called micro earning sites.and there is a section on the forum for it.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=212.0but honestly, they are just a waste of time and effort.OP is asking casinos that offer free satoshis that you can use to play not those coming from faucets oh okay..but there are sites in that section that let u gamble ur faucet earnings too.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on April 03, 2023, 10:37:54 PMOP is there any restrictions as regards the registration on this site which you have mentioned hereAre there any restrictions? Not that I'm aware of, no.Quote from: CryptSafe on April 03, 2023, 10:37:54 PMIf I may ask, were you paid to shill on their behalf? As I checked they have been here for long and I see no reason to be shilling about their casino.No, it seems like most crypto businesses, especially in the gaming/gambling field, have stopped issuing free crypto - BetFury for example changed it to Rank #2, FreeBitco.in cut the free statoshis they give out from 28 to 2 every hour (unless you spend more on their site and then you can increase it).This is a genuine post trying to see where such sites are heading because clearly people are becoming more skeptic about crypto now - feel free to watch this for example:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oA3ayh2OmU0And yes, the future does seem more concerning than it was before ... PS we also run our own faucets, hopefully you can see the full picture now, we have nothing to do with BSpin, but BSpin is the only one out there giving out free crypto more than the others. It just seems like this "strategy" doesn't work so well for gambling sites - hence, it's in the gambling forum.Quote from: ralle14 on April 04, 2023, 03:40:47 AMI honestly think OP just wants to know more casinos that still offer free balance or faucets because you don't see most casinos give any reward for free unless you gamble regularly. It used to be one of the common rewards you'll see in crypto casinos but eventually, they became ineffective.Bingo. Thanks Ralle14.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on April 03, 2023, 04:31:24 PMQuote from: Get-Paid.com on April 03, 2023, 04:07:06 PMbut other than these 2 sites, are there any other sites offering something similar?I would also like to add that Freebitco.in is another site that offers free satoshi every hour along with various other ways to earn Bitcoin. This site has been around for a while and has a good reputation in the community. It's a popular faucet site and a gambling site as well. Have you tried Freebitco.in? Yes Freebitco.in is one of the casinos that provides free bitcoin faucets to their customers but for now getting free bitcoins from Freebitco.in is a little more difficult compared to a few years ago.I admit that Freebitco.in already has a good reputation here even outside the forum too, there we can also make bets that risk the price of bitcoin.I used to be able to earn a lot of Satoshis playing there but now that I was last there I only got a few Satoshis I haven't been to them again.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on April 03, 2023, 09:31:55 PMSeem the usual way of promoting a casino. BSpin will have to continue this 30 sats every 20 mins until they get more users as well. Betfury stopping the boxes and making them available for rank 2 users can decrease users' activity. That experiment will likely backfire.Now that this is announced here, its a signal to visit BSpin.io    So what is the catch with this casino?after all it's just a promotion that is usually done by casinos, I thought this was a bitcoin faucet site turned out to be a bitcoin casino, but it's okay for promotions and campaigns because this can attract new users to test it and play there, many games can be played but not sure 30 that satoshi can be used to gamble there then win and it will be difficult to withdraw it because the casino doesn't want to lose

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: it has been mentioned that Freebitco.in is one of the most popular and being used by many of us till now because they will let you play those airdrop satoshis as long as you wanted without depositing a single amount but the problem is that there is a required amount that they will let you withdraw and that is the hardest part.though other mentioned have hard rules that needs depositing before accumulating the prize you earned.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on April 04, 2023, 05:48:55 AMit has been mentioned that Freebitco.in is one of the most popular and being used by many of us till now because they will let you play those airdrop satoshis as long as you wanted without depositing a single amount but the problem is that there is a required amount that they will let you withdraw and that is the hardest part.though other mentioned have hard rules that needs depositing before accumulating the prize you earned.This was also mentioned above:Quote from: Get-Paid.com on April 04, 2023, 03:54:13 AMFreeBitco.in cut the free statoshis they give out from 28 to 2 every hour (unless you spend more on their site and then you can increase it).

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: I think @ralle14 already gave a good answer here.Does the casinos will let you to withdraw your winnings even though you're only gamble using faucet and never deposit any money? some casino don't want to pay the gambler because they're say faucet is just for testing the site, so be sure you're need to read the terms, if you in doubt you can contact the live support.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: ralle14 on April 04, 2023, 03:40:47 AMYou'll find more similar casinos by checking Pmalek's thread (List Of Crypto Casinos with the Best Faucets). I haven't done any updates in that thread since January, so some information might have changed or the faucets could have been removed altogether. I will try to check it soon. Generally speaking, the days of faucets are long gone. They are good for testing purposes and maybe trying some strategies on particular games, but not as a way of winning. The amounts on offer are mostly worth a few cents.

comments.author: Get-Paid.com
comments.body: Quote from: Helena Yu on April 04, 2023, 11:55:15 AMI think @ralle14 already gave a good answer here.Does the casinos willSorry, it might be only me but in English if you start a sentence with "Does" then you can't use "Will".Does = presentWill = futuree.g.Will you go there?Does he go there?You can't say "does he will go there?"Please just take it as a friendly constructive feedback.Quote from: Helena Yu on April 04, 2023, 11:55:15 AMI think @ralle14 already gave a good answer here.Does the casinos will let you to withdraw your winnings even though you're only gamble using faucet and never deposit any money? some casino don't want to pay the gambler because they're say faucet is just for testing the site, so be sure you're need to read the terms, if you in doubt you can contact the live support.BSpin on their site say the following:Why do you pay people to be here?We figured it’s better to give you the money than to give it to advertising companies or sites like Facebook. Don’t you think so too?If you don't advertise your site - you won't have traffic.No traffic = No business, simple.So what you say might make sense - what they are offering also makes some sense - hence, the question about similar sites IMO is legitimate.Quote from: Pmalek on April 04, 2023, 12:09:27 PMGenerally speaking, the days of faucets are long gone.There are still lots of people with interest in faucets (e.g. like ours, like Freebitco.in, faucetpay) but in general - yes, there is a huge decrease in traffic, interest and more. But free stuff is free stuff, people, by nature, will never say never to free stuff.
